item.title: O
item.description: score:36 Chances: Realty Income Corp. (O) has a focus on leasing to service, non-discretionary, and low price-based retailers, which bodes well for the company’s future prospects. The steady rise in the monthly dividend of Realty Income Corp. is encouraging, indicating a consistent and predictable level of cash flow from operations.
